name: Meta-Llama-3.1-8B Language Model
short_description: An advanced 8-billion-parameter language model developed by Meta AI.
full_description: Meta-Llama-3.1-8B is a state-of-the-art language model designed to understand and generate human-like text. With 8 billion parameters, it excels in various natural language processing tasks such as text generation, translation, and summarization.
keywords: Meta, Llama, Language Model, NLP, Text Generation, Transformer
author: Meta AI
input_data: Trained on a diverse range of internet text data.
output_data: Generates coherent and contextually relevant text based on input prompts.

ai_model.name: Meta-Llama-3.1-8B
ai_model.description: An 8-billion-parameter transformer-based language model developed by Meta AI for advanced NLP tasks.
ai_model.model_structure: Transformer architecture with multiple attention heads and layers.
